sentences.sCn: 我在这个作品中有所犹豫。

sentences.sContent: So if someone asks you out, never hesitate.
sentences.sContent_eng: So if someone asks you out, never hesitate.
sentences.sCn: 如果有人叫你出去玩，千万别犹豫！

sentences.sContent: Yet, this is where so many of us get stuck. We hesitate; we step back from obedience in order to speculate what we should do next -- even though Jesus has already told us what we must do.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yet, this is where so many of us get stuck. We hesitate; we step back from obedience in order to speculate what we should do next -- even though Jesus has already told us what we must do.
sentences.sCn: 然而，我们很多人往往在这里停滞不前，我们犹豫不决；即使主耶稣已经告诉我们当作的事，我们仍然往后退步，不顺服主，还说是为了看清楚下一步该怎么做。

synos.tran: 踌躇，犹豫；有疑虑，不愿意

words.tran: 迟疑的；踌躇的；犹豫不定的

remMethod.val: hes(黏附) ＋ it ＋ ate(做) → 脚像粘住了一样 → 犹豫
